attributes.action: remove the right of bishops to sit in the House of Lords until women are allowed to become bishops.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Quite apart from the many well-founded objections to having faith leaders wielding legislative power over those who don't share their faith, the Anglican and Catholic Bishops and Archbishops in the House of Lords represent an in-built sexual bias, and invariably wield their votes against the interests of women.
